title: 14-day suspension for what ?
body:
Hello everybody,
So, 2 days ago i again downloaded LoL, logged onto my account.
I saw that there is a new honor system in the game.
I read about the system, i liked it. 12.7. i played alot of games enjoyed the game again but then me and my friend were going botlane premade on **normal ** game. We picked our champs, I picked Draven he picked Jayce (idk why) but 2 guys from our team suddenly said that they are going botlane too.
I got tilted so i started to feed middle. we lost.  THAT IS MY 1 GAME THAT I TILTED AND FED. 
Next day i logged onto my account and got 14-day suspension :) ??? for 1 game that i fed ? 
But thats not the thing i am angry about. The thing is that i dropped my honor level to 0. ZERO
I would not make this discussion if i wouldÂ´ve dropped to level 1,  but level 0 ?
_**I am responsible for my decisions** ._ i fed that ONE god damn game.

game: http://matchhistory.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUN1/1749605393/31203281?tab=overview

replies.body:
It's good that you realized that intentionally feeding in that one game was still negative behavior. I went ahead and pulled up your account to see what happened with your honor level, and it looks like our system detected a history of feeding from player reports which issued the 14 day suspension. 

If you check out the [**Honor FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148), a two week suspension will drop your Honor Level to 0 regardless of where you currently are.
Finally an inter gets caught. This is extremely rare and is pretty much just bad luck for you.
